answers.answer: I am 18 weeks tomorrow and have only gained 5. I was overweight to begin with so doc only wants me to gain 15 total.
12 wks tomorrow... no gain yet.

I wouldn't worry.   Most say 0-6 lbs in the first 3 mo, then. 1lb/ week after. Based on that ur super close.  Just 2 lb off.... no worries there.  I'm 19 weeks and have gained 6-7 so far but feel huge!  I was tiny to start w so I think that's why
I'm 29 weeks.  I've gained 20lbs so far. I'm eating normal amounts of food and not overeating so I'm not worried about it.

I'm 23wks and have gained about 20 lbs I was under weight before I got pregnant so I'm not too worried and my doctor hasn't said anything about it. It also looks to be all in my belly so far also my belly button has already popped out lol.
Oops darn phone 24lbs
I will be 33 weeks tomorrow and I have gained only 10 pounds i lost weight throughout my pregnancy because I started off overweight

35 weeks and gained 8lbs. The past 3 appointments I've had, I go in thinking I've gained a lot but haven't. Baby is healthy and doing well. I'm overweight for my height anyway so I can't complain. With my first I gained 44lbs. And my second I gained 6 but only because I lost so much in the beginning. Not sure why I haven't gained more than I have this time but again, can't complain. lol
33Wks 4days total weight gain 40 pounds all belly. And I have learned that some people just don't know what to say to pregnant women pay them no attention

I'm almost 31 weeks and have gained 30 total but about 7 of that is fluid they say... Probably the start of preeclampsia so I'm being monitored... As long as its gradual it shouldn't be a concern... Some women gain more and some gain less... Your Dr will tell you if he thinks it is unhealthy
24 weeks today 22lbs
24 weeks and am down 5 pounds from pre pregnancy. I swear every time I go in I'm going to gain 10 pounds but I never gain anything
At my 36 week appointment, I had gained 23.5, which is high for my weight according to this app, but my doc is fine with it.
I'm 24 weeks and only gained 4 pounds..
35 weeks and two days and I've only gained 7..I'm overweight and really short Tho..doctor said I wouldn't gain much
I'm 38 weeks and have gained 35lbs. Thank god because I was underweight!The last 2 weeks I've maintained my weight haven't gained or lost.  Yay
I'm 18 weeks and I've gained 6 lbs so far, I can't gain more than 15 lbs because of my weight before the pregnancy
31 weeks tomorrow and I've gained 17 pounds
26 weeks 7.5lbs-but I was a little over weight to begin with & doc recommended 1-15lbs total-so I've been careful.
10-15lbs total*

question: How much have you mommas gained?  I'm 24 Weeks 2 days and I've gained about 20lbs. Which seems to be over the projected weight gain  for being 6 months. It's all in my belly. But im sick of ppl asking how many days before I'm due.. ppl get surprised when I tell them I'm not due til sept.
title: weight gain?
